Lykke Capital is a venture capital firm focusing on early-stage investments.

Our current portfolio includes companies in consumer technology, consumer brand, enterprise technology, and blockchain. We're open to investing in more sectors.

Investment Thesis

We are dedicated to providing capital to entrepreneurs pursuing and finding the good that exists in the world around us every day.

  • Sectors

    While we are sector-agnostic in general, we like investing in consumer technology, consumer brands, FinTech and SaaS (consumer and enterprise).

  • Stage

    We typically invest at the early-stage, from angel round to pre-Series A. We only co-invest with leading institutional investors and very rarely lead rounds.

  • Cheque Size

    Our average cheque size is between $70k - $150k.

Investment Process

Lykke Capital operates as a syndicate listed on AngelList India. It is led by experienced technology investors and financed by institutional investors and sophisticated angels. It is a great option if you are keen on angel investing but don’t have access to high quality startups or the time to evaluate multiple startups.

To get access to the syndicate,

  1. Register on AngelList, if you don’t already have an account.
  2. Read the FAQs.
  3. After you have read and understood all the FAQs, click on the apply button below.
Apply

Portfolio

While we are sector-agnostic, our current portfolio includes companies in consumer technology, consumer brand, enterprise technology, and blockchain. Our latest investment (January 2022) was in the premium cosmetics brand, Plume Beauty.

  • Let's Dress Up (LDU)

  • Glip (formerly ggtv)

  • Plume Beauty

  • TravClan

  • Recur Club
